messages: I'm trying to do my best but I don't understand
I'm not sure what message you want to communicate to me
I'm still young, you could help me to better understand on my Github
I can't understand your request, sorry
Please reduce the size of your message to less than 500
I don't find a country in your message
Your math expression is not valid
I'm sorry but I don't know your name yet
I am sorry I can't find a name in your message.
